introduction: Students of New Uzbekistan University (NewUU) are thrilled to announce the expansion of the 'Hogwarts Summer School,' a unique program designed to immerse secondary school students and university students into research.
goals: Develop research skills, build networking, and cultivate future leaders through interactive workshops and a vibrant community at Hogwarts Summer School.
milestones: Applications open autumn 2024, selection in winter 2025, mentoring in spring, camp in August 2025.
student selection: The selection process includes essay submission, case study, and interview, starting mid April until early June.
academic program: Focuses on Software Technologies, Building Institutions, Ecology, Education, and runs online from March to May.
social activities: Quidditch tournaments, mythical beasts care, and workshops to improve teamwork during the one-week camp in August.
timeline_structure: The Academic Part will start from early March till mid-May and will consist of 12 weeks of online sessions based on SPRINT methodology (AGILE theory).

social_engagement_activities.timeline: Main social activities during the 1-week camp in early August at Renaissance Camp near Tashkent.
structure: Quidditch Tournaments: Engage in thrilling matches testing teamwork and strategy.
Care of Mythical Beasts: Interactive exhibits and guest lectures about magical creatures and conservation.
Charms for Collaboration: Workshops to improve communication and teamwork skills.

admission_help.description: To join the Hogwarts Summer School, students go through a 3-stage selection process:

stages.title: Submit a short essay and CV
stages.details: Introduce yourself and explain your motivation.

stages.title: Complete a case study
stages.details: Demonstrate your research skills with a practical task.

stages.title: Attend an interview
stages.details: Answer creative questions about your experiences and behavior.

tips: Choose projects that match your strengths and interests.
Prepare by practicing research and problem-solving skills.
Be yourself and show your passion during the interview.
admission_help.contact: For more information, visit the Hogwarts Telegram channel or contact the admission office.

statistics: Website https://hogwarts.streamlit.app contains demographic and applicant region data, but is under constant development.
